articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: What I learned from my first few months with a Bambu Lab A1 3D printer, part 1 - Ars Technica
articles.description: One neophyte’s first steps into the wide world of 3D printing.

articles.author: Jen Christensen
articles.title: FDA requires Covid vaccine makers to expand warning about risk of rare heart inflammation - CNN
articles.description: The US Food and Drug Administration will now require Covid-19 vaccines from Pfizer/BioNTech and Moderna to use expanded warning labels with more information about the risk of a rare heart condition after vaccination.
